name: Octo Design
tagline: LET US BE YOUR MARKETING ARM
description:
The Octo Philosophy. Founded on the principle that successful creative must be a combination of premium design and strategic marketing experience, Octo has been providing powerful marketing tools focused on results and solutions with a client-first culture since 1991.
Octo believes that practical expertise produces better focus on product, promotion and a principled approach to branding, website design, marketing and advertising campaigns – the full scope of communication strategies that identifies opportunities for your continued success. It’s a results-oriented approach – a comprehensive philosophy centered on working together with you, our partner, to visualize the potential of your company’s personality, your products, your brand.
